description: This file is a Python script that provides a command-line interface for initializing various software projects based on user-specified parameters. It handles argument parsing, project configuration creation, and invokes templates to set up projects. It also outputs structured JSON summaries of the initialization process.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a comma-separated string of key=value pairs into a dictionary with typed values.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Creates a ProjectConfig object from CLI arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a relative path to an absolute path based on the project directory.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object into a dict with absolute paths suitable for JSON serialization.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Formats and prints a JSON response indicating success or failure, including project template info.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Main CLI entry point handling argument parsing, project setup, and invocation of project initialization.

ctags.name: output_json
ctags.pattern: /^def output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_pat/
ctags.signature: (success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
